definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
step with the right foot/see 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
to defend the crown (in sports championship)
satellite TV (abbr. for 衛星電視|卫星电视[wei4 xing1 dian4 shi4])
public cleanliness/(urban) sanitation/environmental sanitation/abbr. for 環境衛生|环境卫生[huan2 jing4 wei4 sheng1]

sentences.english: The yellow fever vaccine used must be approved by WHO.
sentences.chinese: 使用的黃熱病疫苗必須經世衛組織批准。

sentences.english: Empower law-abiding gun owners to defend themselves.
sentences.chinese: 允許那些守法的槍支擁有者用槍來自衛。

sentences.english: To defend the Constitution and laws of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 扞衛美國的憲法和法律。

sentences.english: A seaweedreleases acid for defense when it's injured.
sentences.chinese: 海草在受傷時釋放酸液來自衛。

sentences.english: Within days, Wei's article itself had been removed from several state-run websites.
sentences.chinese: 幾天後，衛英傑的文章在幾個官方網站上自動消失了。

sentences.english: But she has long left the Catholic Church and attends a Methodist church.
sentences.chinese: 但她早就離開天主教會，加入了衛裏公教會。

sentences.english: Pay focus on protectplould like resource of rock tea.
sentences.chinese: 着重巖茶種植資源扞衛。

sentences.english: China is just developing technology to defend themselves.
sentences.chinese: 中國是扞衛自身的正義建造的技術。

sentences.english: An agent for super star quarterback Brett Farve says his client is retiring.
sentences.chinese: 超級明星四分衛佈雷特法弗的經濟人稱他就要退休了。

sentences.english: Official development aid for health more than tripled.
sentences.chinese: 官方衛生髮展援助也翻了三番以上。

sentences.english: The quarterback signed a contract with the Broncos .
sentences.chinese: 這個四分衛和野馬隊簽了合約。

sentences.english: What are the public health implications of global ageing?
sentences.chinese: 全球老齡化的公共衛含意是什生麼？

sentences.english: The center's primary role is to pass the football to the quarterback.
sentences.chinese: 中鋒的首要任務是把足球傳給球隊的四分衛。

sentences.english: He quarterbacked for the school team.
sentences.chinese: 他在學校橄欖球隊裏打四分衛。

sentences.english: While at Purdue, he played quarterback for the Boilermakers football team.
sentences.chinese: 而在普渡，他扮演的鍋爐工人足球隊的四分衛。

sentences.english: I'm dancin' on Mr. Grave's face.
sentences.chinese: 我踩在古拉衛先生老臉上跳舞。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
